description_text:
Hello,
Sorry to disturb you, but I was wondering something regarding an order I
made a week ago. I was wondering if you had some sort of information on
when they will be shipped. I do not want to be that guy that is rushing
everything up, but I selected the express shipment for it to arrive as soon
as possible since this weekend is the biggest weekend on Iracing, but Shop
app says there is no information available.
Sorry for disturbing again and thank you in advance,
Agustín

conversations.body_text: Hi Gusete Team,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Hello,
Thank you for your response. I have no problem at all waiting as long as it
takes, I was just wondering since I needed them for this weekend, but I do
not any longer so there is no rush at all.
Wish you the best of luck with all the delayed orders and sorry again for
disturbing,
Agustín

El mié, 14 ene 2026 a las 11:30, service@simsonn.com (
Hi Gusete Team,    Thank you for your understanding.  Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
